parsed_action.reasoning: Apply small, inventory-informed price tests to balance margin and velocity under uncertainty. Lower price on higher inventory (APPAREL) to stimulate sales, keep near baseline with charm pricing on mid inventory (ELECTRONICS) to preserve buy box competitiveness, and slightly increase price on lower inventory (HOME_GOODS) to protect margin and avoid stockout risk. Changes are modest to gauge elasticity without destabilizing performance.
